languages.text: "Наставник... Почему я? Неужели высшую опасность для своей паствы ты видишь... во мне?" {n}Голос Кибеллы дрожит от боли.{/n}
"Mentor... Why me? Do you truly think the greatest danger to your flock is... me?" {n}Kibellah's voice trembles with pain.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Наставник... Почему я? Неужели высшую опасность для своей паствы ты видишь... во мне?" {n}Голос Кибеллы дрожит от боли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mentor... Why me? Do you really think... I am the greatest danger to your flock?" {n}Kibellah's voice is trembling with pain.{/n}
"Mentor... Why me? Do you really think... I am the greatest danger to your flock?" {n}Kibellah's voice is trembling with pain.{/n}

"Mentor... Why me? Do you truly think the greatest danger to your flock is... me?" {n}Kibellah's voice trembles with pain.{/n}
"Mentor... Why me? Do you truly think the greatest danger to your flock is... me?" {n}Kibellah's voice trembles with pain.{/n}

languages.text: « Mentor... Pourquoi pas ? Pensez-vous vraiment que le plus grand danger qui menace vos ouailles... c'est moi ? » {n}demande Kibellah d'une voix peinée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mentor... Why me? Do you truly think the greatest danger to your flock is... me?" {n}Kibellah's voice trembles with pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mentor... Pourquoi pas ? Pensez-vous vraiment que le plus grand danger qui menace vos ouailles... c'est moi ? » {n}demande Kibellah d'une voix peinée.{/n}

languages.text: «Mentor... ¿por qué yo? ¿De verdad cree que la mayor amenaza para el rebaño... soy yo?». {n}La voz de Kibellah se estremece por el dolor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mentor... Why me? Do you truly think the greatest danger to your flock is... me?" {n}Kibellah's voice trembles with pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mentor... ¿por qué yo? ¿De verdad cree que la mayor amenaza para el rebaño... soy yo?». {n}La voz de Kibellah se estremece por el dolor.{/n}

languages.text: 「師よ…なぜ私が？群れにとって最も危険な人物は…私だと言うのですか？」{n}キベラの声が痛みで震えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mentor... Why me? Do you truly think the greatest danger to your flock is... me?" {n}Kibellah's voice trembles with pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「師よ…なぜ私が？群れにとって最も危険な人物は…私だと言うのですか？」{n}キベラの声が痛みで震えている。{/n}

languages.text: “师父……为什么是我？你真的认为，你的牧群眼下最大的危险就是……我吗？”{n}绮贝菈的声音因痛苦而颤抖。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mentor... Why me? Do you truly think the greatest danger to your flock is... me?" {n}Kibellah's voice trembles with pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “师父……为什么是我？你真的认为，你的牧群眼下最大的危险就是……我吗？”{n}绮贝菈的声音因痛苦而颤抖。{/n}

languages.text: "Mentor ... warum ich? Denkt Ihr wirklich, die größte Gefahr für Eure Herde sei ... ich?" {n}Kibellahs Stimme zittert vor Schmerz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mentor... Why me? Do you truly think the greatest danger to your flock is... me?" {n}Kibellah's voice trembles with pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mentor ... warum ich? Denkt Ihr wirklich, die größte Gefahr für Eure Herde sei ... ich?" {n}Kibellahs Stimme zittert vor Schmerz.{/n}

languages.text: "Yönderim... Neden ben? Cemaatinize karşı en büyük tehlikenin... Ben olduğuma hakikaten inanıyor musunuz?" {n}Kibellah'nın sesi acıyla titriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mentor... Why me? Do you truly think the greatest danger to your flock is... me?" {n}Kibellah's voice trembles with pain.{/n}
